## âœ… Essential Checklist

### Code Quality

- [ ] Code follows ESLint and linting rules.
- [ ] No console.logs or debugging code left.
- [ ] Code is clean and well-organized.
- [ ] TypeScript types are properly defined (if applicable).

### UI/UX

- [ ] Design matches **Figma/requirements**.
- [ ] RTL layout works correctly.
- [ ] Responsive on all screens:
  - [ ] Mobile (320px+)
  - [ ] Tablet (768px+)
  - [ ] Desktop (1024px+).

### SEO

- [ ] Meta tags (title, description, keywords) are added/updated.
- [ ] Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata are included.

### Assets

- [ ] Images are optimized and handled for different densities (1x, 2x, 3x).
- [ ] Proper image formats are used (webp preferred or avif).
- [ ] Assets follow naming conventions.
- [ ] Icons use the Nuxt Icon module.

### Testing

- [ ] Unit tests are written and passing.
- [ ] End-to-end tests are performed for critical flows.

### Documentation

- [ ] Documentation is updated for new features or changes.
- [ ] Instructions for setup and usage are clear.
